lead_paragraph: When the Tampa Bay Lightning arrived in Ottawa, they hadn't been pleased with their overall play this season. A strong performance against the Senators was definitely a step in the right direction.

headline.print_headline: Vasilevskiy Makes 27 Saves, Lightning Beat Senators 4-1
headline.main: Vasilevskiy Makes 27 Saves, Lightning Beat Senators 4-1
